籤詩版本二:
Amagqabi emithi yesikamore awile, ukwindla kusondela, yaye uhambo lokubuya lwabahambi lukhangeleka njengamafu.
Ngenxa yemigudu emikhulu kaThixo, inqanawa yabuya nobutyebi emoyeni.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele amagqabi awayo omthi wesikamore.
Yonke into imbi kwangaphambili kwaye ilungile ekugqibeleni.
解曰: Thatha izinto ngokusuka entliziyweni. Walandela uTian Xin. Ukwenza ubomi. Yenza nantoni na onokuyenza.

◇Umoya ubhudla uye eTengwang Pavilion

Ekwindla lonyaka xa wayeneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesixhenxe, uWang Bo wemka eShanxi waya eHainan Island ukuya kutyelela uyise, owayethe wathotyelwa kwisikhundla sikaMantyi weNqila yaseJiaozhi. UWang Bo wathi, "Le ndawo ikumgama weemayile ezingamakhulu amathandathu okanye asixhenxe ukusuka eTengwang Pavilion. Singafika njani apha ngomso?"

Kukho umbongo othi:
Kwahlala kuthiwa abantu abanetalente bangoothixo, ngoko akusiyo ingozi ukuba umoya uzisa uNanchang eNanchang;
Ndabhala isivakalisi malunga ne-pavilion ephezulu kaTeng Wang, kwaye emva koko wahamba kunye nabangenakufa ukuya eZhongyuan.
聖意: Thandazela ikhaya lakho kwaye uzikhusele, uthandazele iintsikelelo, funa ubutyebi, kwaye ufezekise umtshato kunye nemvisiswano.
